field.name: fLadderInteractBlockingDistance
field.desc: Distance from the ladder of the interact volumes.

field.name: ladderInteractVolume
field.desc: Volume in front of ladder controlling interactions. If anything else is within the volume the ladder will not be usable.

field.name: ladderFootBlockingVolume
field.desc: Volume below the player that tests if the step you are climbing down to has something obstructing it.

field.name: fTacticComboTime
field.desc: Max time to press both tactic buttons

field.name: fClimbDistance
field.desc: Distance player must be within to climb.

field.name: fJumpClimbPitch
field.desc: When jumping the maximum pitch angle in degrees the player must be within to climg onto a ledge.

field.name: arkClimbArchetype
field.desc: Name of the ledge archetype to create when unbaking climbable objects

field.name: fLootInteractOverrideDistance
field.desc: The extra distance check for looting corpses. Will be ignored if 0 or larger than the current use interact box.

field.name: fLootStandingDistance
field.desc: the distance the player will be from the body when looting it.

field.name: fLootPitchFOV
field.desc: the pitch the target must be within from the camera angle to be lootable.

field.name: fUse_boxcheck_x
field.desc: Extra distance on x for bounding box check.

field.name: fUse_boxcheck_y
field.desc: Extra distance on y for bounding box check.

field.name: fUse_boxcheck_z
field.desc: Extra distance on z for bounding box check.

field.name: fUse_boxcheck_z_bottom_offset
field.desc: Extra distance on z for bounding box check.

field.name: fUse_boxcheck_triggers_front
field.desc: Extra distance on y for bounding box check.
